instruction: Create three text-based mini-games in Python.
output:
The three text-based mini-games in Python created are as follows:

1. A Hangman game where the player has to guess the word by entering letters until the word is guessed correctly.
2. A Blackjack game where two players have to draw cards to get as close as possible to 21 points.
3. A Guess the Number game where the player has to guess a random number between 1 and 100.
